sentences.sContent: They try to equip their vehicles with gadgets to deal with every possible contingency.
sentences.sCn: 他们尽量给他们的车辆配备各种小装置以应付任何可能的突发状况。

sentences.sContent: ...the company spent 10-15% more per user to equip them with a laptop rather than a PC...

trans.tranCn: 装备， 配备； 使有准备
trans.tranOther: to provide a person or place with the things that are needed for a particular kind of activity or work
